thread.title: Mel H
thread.title_full: Paradise First Aid reviewed by Mel H

author: Mel H
title: Mel H
text:
Great in every aspect. Mel B had a grreat natural style and a depth of knowledge in her teaching. I liked her earthiness and straight to the point in providing scenario examples in the real world... you could relate too that made the course more easier to understand. Thank you.
Melissa Harris. March 2017
